siteMetadata.name: Md. Imam Hossain
siteMetadata.title: Imam Hossain | Software Engineer
siteMetadata.description: Software Engineer | Android, Kotlin, Java, Flutter
siteMetadata.about: I am a passionate programmer and results-oriented mobile apps developer with more than two years of experience in the development position. Creating apps with a usable and clean user interface experience is my goal. I am self-driven and hungry to learn new technologies and strategies. I enjoy building stuff and removing complexities from code, products, and processes. I know the importance of creating highly readable and easily maintainable source code. So my main focus is to maintain proper guidelines and architecture while developing apps.
